author: bayard
msg: Protected a Number test so it only runs in 1.3+. I suspect the JDK doesn't support the type of number we're throwing at it in 1.2:  "1.1E-700F" to BigDecimal.

author: bayard
msg: Protected a test which fails in JDK 1.2, probably because the JDK doesn't support that number format [a float with an exponential number]

author: bayard
msg: Added in explicit this.'s as needed by JDK 1.2's compiler.
